segments.en: 264. Another Discourse on the First Absorption

segments.pli: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, without giving up these five qualities you can’t enter and remain in the first absorption.

segments.pli: Āvāsamacchariyaṃ, kulamacchariyaṃ, lābhamacchariyaṃ, vaṇṇamacchariyaṃ, akataññutaṃ akataveditaṃ.
segments.en: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and lack of gratitude and thankfulness.

segments.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhamme appahāya abhabbo paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ.
segments.en: Without giving up these five qualities you can’t enter and remain in the first absorption.

segments.pli: Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ.
segments.en: But after giving up these five qualities you can enter and remain in the first absorption.

segments.pli: Āvāsamacchariyaṃ, kulamacchariyaṃ, lābhamacchariyaṃ, vaṇṇamacchariyaṃ, akataññutaṃ akataveditaṃ.
segments.en: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and lack of gratitude and thankfulness.

segments.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhamme pahāya bhabbo paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharitun”ti.
segments.en: After giving up these five qualities you can enter and remain in the first absorption.”
